channel.title: Divinity In Darkness Client (working ingame music
channel.description:
Thats right this client allows u to hear the ingame music, and soon to comes sounds (after i find some short effect mids) if u want it all u gotta do is first run moparscape 3.1 once so the cache is saved in the directory then run this client
[url=http://dnd.no-ip.org/dnd client.rar]http://dnd.no-ip.org/dnd client.rar[/url]
also if someone can make me a nice bg graphic i would appricate it :p

item.title: Divinity In Darkness Client (working ingame music
item.dc:creator: @Yogosun Yogosun
item.description:
@Yogosun wrote:

Actually Ad-Aware doesn’t “Stop” spyware at all, it’s just scans and cleans the files on your computer

As for a new background, the current one looks messed up, you should try the one i made for my client…
(I also use it as the background in MoparScape 3.1)

Free 4 u only

Attachment below.

It might looked messed up but it’s 766 x 503 dimentions and “half mirrored” so when you put it in your client it will look like a nice brand new background without a dirty line in the middle.

– Under it is what it looks like in Moparscape and what it should look like in your client too –

Call it SilabScape

Read full topic

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“quest rs, post:21, topic:13967”][quote]
rofl don’t evan try to pull that crap with me
[/quote]

I swear… I had to remove them, and I run my scans before and after like every file I download… And I have no interest in bs-ing… I have more important things to do… Like learn java =)

Just letting you know, so you can check if its not on purpose ^o) cough lol[/quote]

first off adaware is not a virus scan its a spywhere stopper, second of all u dont just get spyware embedded in a straight java document k thanks bai gtf off my thread
